PPE is needed now for hospitals, LTC, nursing homes & other essential health service providers. Urgent action is needed to ensure the safety of our health care workers who are working tirelessly to provide life-saving care to a growing number of our most vulnerable patients.

I wrote about this the other day. Growing calls for ALL patients in hospitals and LTC to get tested — even if asymptomatic —to prevent outbreaks.  Ditto for ALL healthcare workers in ALL sectors....priority testing, even if asymptomatic.

All LTC need support NOW to implement prevention (robust screening, earloop masks for all staff to prevent transmission of presymptomatic/early symptomatic to residents), early detection, & immediate response if cases detected.  Waiting until there is a #COVID19 case is too late!
